structure.unit: COUNTIES, CITIES, AND OTHER LOCAL UNITS
ISSUANCE OF BONDS AND CONTROL OF FUNDS

law.history: Repealed 1982 Ky. Acts ch. 434, sec. 15, effective July 1, 1982; amended 1982 Ky. Acts ch. 360, sec. 15.. -- Amended 1966 Ky. Acts ch. 239, sec. 5. -- Recodified 1942 Ky. Acts ch. 208, sec. 1, effective October 1, 1942, from Ky. Stat. secs. 186b-10, 3069.

metadata.catchline-at-repeal: City of first or second class, incurring indebtedness beyond income for year -- Issuance of bonds.
metadata.lrc-note: . This section was amended by 1982 Acts, Chapter 360, Â§ 15 and repealed by 1982 Acts, Chapter 434, Â§ 15. Pursuant to KRS 446.260, the repeal prevails.
